thread.title: Powell’s First Problem: Taming the Job Market

author: Justin Lahart
title: Powell’s First Problem: Taming the Job Market
text:
Jerome Powell caused a minor stir in his first testimony before Congress when the Federal Reserve chairman said the economy had gotten stronger than the central bank’s view in December.

That got investors thinking there would be four rate increases instead of three this year. Bolstering that view was a nugget in the Fed report that accompanied the testimony. There, the central bank said the U.S. economy “appears to be near or a little beyond full employment at present.” Mr. Powell expanded on that by saying the unemployment...
